description:
Even if you lose your memories, that does not absolve your sins... The aim of the Reformed Magic Council wasn`t just Oracion Seis, but to capture Jellal! Seeing Erza`s expression as she grapples with that reality, the rest of Fairy Tail springs into action to stop his arrest. What is Erza`s answer, as she watches over it all? 
Then, Wendy and the others return to the guild Caitshelter, where Master Robaul tells them the shocking truth. What is Caitshelter`s big secret?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tatta Hitori no Tame no Guild
Uma Guilda Pelo Bem De Um Só!
Une guilde fondée pour une personne
たった一人の為のギルド
